testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 01 Entering Pro Web
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed And There is a box called "Campaigns".......................................passed And Log Out button exist....................................................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Home Page........................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 02 Entering Pro Web with incorrect details
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "INVALID".....................................................passed Then An error message displayed advising to try again.......................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 03 Campaigns page loaded
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then The Campaigns page loads successfully..................................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Home Page........................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 04 Campaigns page loaded with different options
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then Log out, Back to Home, Flights icon shown on Campaign page.............passed And Creatives option shown on the Campaigns tab.............................passed And Pixels option shown on the Campaigns tab................................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Home Page........................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 05 Navigated to Campaigns when logged in with only Campaign Web role
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "CAMPAIGN MANAGEMENT WEB".....................................passed Then Log out, Back to Home, Flights icon shown on Campaign page.............passed And Creatives option not shown on the Campaigns tab.........................passed And Pixels option not shown on the Campaigns tab............................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Home Page........................................passed
